bibl.title: with chapters by T.J.C. Baly, D.B. Harden, J.W. Jackson, G. Mattha and Alan W. Shorter, and the Hieroglyphic Inscriptions edited by H.W. Fairman, The Bucheum. Vol. I: The History and Archaeology of the Site; - Vol. II: The Inscriptions; - Vol. III: The Plates. (Memoirs of the Egypt Exploration Society. 41.)
bibl.note: Voir en part.: II, pp. 75-78: A.S. Hunt, T.C. Skeat and J.G. Tait, The Greek Ostraka; - III, pl. LXXVIII: Greek Ostraka. - Édition de 8 ostraca et description de 27 autres. Époques ptolémaïque et romaine. Non reproduits dans S.B.
bibl.seg: Mond Robert and Oliver H. Meyers, with chapters by T.J.C. Baly, D.B. Harden, J.W. Jackson, G. Mattha and Alan W. Shorter, and the Hieroglyphic Inscriptions edited by H.W. Fairman, The Bucheum. Vol. I: The History and Archaeology of the Site; - Vol. II: The Inscriptions; - Vol. III: The Plates. (Memoirs of the Egypt Exploration Society. 41.)
London, The Egypt Exploration Society - H. Milford, 1934, 4°, xii-203 pp., tabl. dépl. - iv-92 pp., tabl.; - iv-169 pp., cartes, plans dépl.
Mond Meyers Baly Harden Jackson Mattha Shorter Fairman Hunt Skeat Tait
